suites.title: Pending Approval Appointment Details Test cases

tests.title: As a Admin the user should be navigated to the Appointment Details page of "Pending Approval" appointment by clicking on the eye icon against that appointment
tests.fullTitle: Pending Approval Appointment Details Test cases As a Admin the user should be navigated to the Appointment Details page of "Pending Approval" appointment by clicking on the eye icon against that appointment

tests.title: At "Appointment details" page each label and field should have proper label and validations
tests.fullTitle: Pending Approval Appointment Details Test cases At "Appointment details" page each label and field should have proper label and validations

tests.title: The unique appointment id should be displayed
tests.fullTitle: Pending Approval Appointment Details Test cases The unique appointment id should be displayed

tests.title: The date requested by the patient should be displayed
tests.fullTitle: Pending Approval Appointment Details Test cases The date requested by the patient should be displayed

tests.title: The Service Address where the patient requested the service should be displayed
tests.fullTitle: Pending Approval Appointment Details Test cases The Service Address where the patient requested the service should be displayed

tests.title: As a Admin the user should be navigated to the medical history page of particular patient by clicking on the name card of that particular patient
tests.fullTitle: Pending Approval Appointment Details Test cases As a Admin the user should be navigated to the medical history page of particular patient by clicking on the name card of that particular patient

tests.title: The list of services requested by the patient should be displayed
tests.fullTitle: Pending Approval Appointment Details Test cases The list of services requested by the patient should be displayed

tests.title: As a Admin the user can accept the Appointment By clicking on the "Accept" button
tests.fullTitle: Pending Approval Appointment Details Test cases As a Admin the user can accept the Appointment By clicking on the "Accept" button

tests.title: As a Admin the user can Add "Comment for Provider" By clicking on the "Edit" icon against it.
tests.fullTitle: Pending Approval Appointment Details Test cases As a Admin the user can Add "Comment for Provider" By clicking on the "Edit" icon against it.

tests.title: As a Admin the user can cancel the appointment after entering the cancellation reason by clicking on the cancel button
tests.fullTitle: Pending Approval Appointment Details Test cases As a Admin the user can cancel the appointment after entering the cancellation reason by clicking on the cancel button
